data.name: button3.ToolTip
data.value:
Sinclair ZX Spectrum
Native Console I/O 32x24 and 64x24
VT100 Console I/O 24..85x24(Colour)
Monochrome Graphics 256x192
Grey Graphics No
File I/O Yes
ZSock Network No
Sound 1 Bit + PSG
Other features / notes Sprite Pack. Native file IO available for +3 and Microdrive; BASIC driver supports many other disc types.

data.name: button4.ToolTip

Monochrome Graphics 256x192
Grey Graphics No
File I/O No
ZSock Network No
Sound 1 Bit
Other features / notes Sprite Pack.

data.name: button5.ToolTip
